EmailTemplate.name: TMG - Drawdown Utilization request
EmailTemplate.subject: Drawdown Request from {!Drawdown__c.Relationship__c} for {!Drawdown__c.Deal__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Day {!Drawdown__c.CreatedBy}
Please be advised that we have received a utilisation request from {!Drawdown__c.Relationship__c} for {!Drawdown__c.Deal__c} and {!Drawdown__c.Agreement__c} and the documentation and governance check has been completed by Transaction Administration.
